metadata.title: CVE-2016-10074 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The mail transport (aka Swift_Transport_MailTransport) in Swift Mailer before 5.4.5 might allow remote attackers to pass extra parameters to the mail command and consequently execute arbitrary code via a \" (backslash double quote) in a crafted e-mail address in the (1) From, (2) ReturnPath, or (3) Sender header.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2016-10074` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-swiftmailer - 5.4.2-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libphp-swiftmailer package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.4.2-1.1').
